threat: An attacker could potentially exploit a user who had installed an add-on that used loadSubscript in vulnerable ways.
An attacker could possibly use this flaw this to steal data or inject malicious scripts into web content.
An attacker might be able to exploit this without using the debugging APIs which would potentially allow an attacker to remotely crash Thunderbird.
